title: Textile, "Drum Ties", 1958
medium:
Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave foundation patterned by supplementary warp floats bound in groups by a loop of a foundation weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 289.6 x 134.6 cm (9 ft. 6 in. x 53 in.)
description: Length of woven fabric patterned by a regular alternation of bands: 2" textured band alternating with a 5"band patterned by long warp floats tied in groups forming Xs on a plain weave background.  Yarns are ivory on ivory plied with tan for a total color effect of light tan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Drum Ties", 1958.Medium: synthetic
Technique: plain weave foundation patterned by supplementary warp floats bound in groups by a loop of a foundation weft. 1971-69-1.
